name: Order
description: Part of a modern version of the Gravel piece. As the inital piece displays both order and discipline, I decided to split these into two. This first piece resembles the order side of generative art. Pieces move smoothly, non chaotically between the canvas.

name: Disorder
description: Part of a modern version of the Gravel piece. As the inital piece displays both order and discipline, I decided to split these into two. This second piece resembles the disorder side of generative art. Pieces are chaotically placed between the canvas, having no room to breathe, screaming.

name: Turrell Halo
description: Digital version of an light artwork by one of my favorite artists - James Turrell. Explores light and perception with layered ellipses. Moving the cursor around the page, makes the light follow it.

name: Turrell Zoom
description: Digital version of an light artwork by James Turrell, featuring a scrollable zoom element, allowing the user to zoom into the 'light'. Scroll down to interact.

name: Gravel boids
description: Gravel art piece featuring flying boids that fly and light up the background square elements, lighting up the path.

name: Star waves
description: Artwork inspired by a visual pattern math and expression puzzles on tixy land.

name: Frequency visualizer
description: Artwork visualizes frequency of a song '3' by 2hollis in a form of bars. It visualizes frequency rather than the rythm or beat directly - kind of like an audio equalizer.

name: 300BPM
description: Beat visualizer that visualizes my beat I made using ToneJS, uses high BPM and flashing lights to represent Techno electro dance music aesthetic.
